channel.title: Want a laugh? angry forum member
channel.description:
[quote="Thornton136"][quote author=Moparisthebest link=action=profile;u=1 date=1233076968] [quote author=Thornton136 link=action=profile;u=333938 date=1233074212] :mad: :mad: Taharok HE PUT ME ON MODERATION FOR POSTING TO A TOPIC I DIDNT DO ANYTHING WRONG?? I NEED THIS SORTING OUT PLEASE OH AND IM TAKING YOUR AD OF MY SITE AND SIGS!! UNLESS THIS GETS SORTED IMMEDIATLY [/quote] You bumped a topic that was over 2 years old, did you look at the date as Taharok said? And for future reference, threats are useless against me and make me even less likely to do what you ask. Did I ever ask you to advertise on your free site for me? Do you think I actually care whether you take it down or not? Think about it. [/quote] fine Oh and Let me remind you!! You are The rudest person I have ever Known Oh Your SERVER+Client SUCKS!!!!! SILAB MUCH BETTER DONT CARE ANYMORE YOU HAVE LOST ME AND THE 70 people I TOLD AT SCHOOL!!!! I THOUGHT THIS WAS A GREAT SITE AND YOU RUINED IT[/quote] I thought this was so funny I had to share it with everyone. You can even look at his new signature:
MOPARSCAPE IS SHIT!!!The creator is a pedofile!! Got my own forums Http://teenzone.smfforfree.com My forums much better NO PEDOS THERE
I might ban him later, his sig is pretty offensive. So how funny is this?

item.title: Want a laugh? angry forum member
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Chassy13:

Lol I am gonna go spam his site.

No need it already fails =/

Read full topic
item.source: Want a laugh? angry forum member

item.title: Want a laugh? angry forum member
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:1, topic:258911”][quote author=Thornton136 link=action=profile;u=333938 date=1233079226]

:mad:
:mad:

Taharok

HE PUT ME ON MODERATION FOR POSTING TO A TOPIC

I DIDNT DO ANYTHING WRONG??

I NEED THIS SORTING OUT PLEASE

OH AND IM TAKING YOUR AD OF MY SITE AND SIGS!!

UNLESS THIS GETS SORTED IMMEDIATLY

You bumped a topic that was over 2 years old, did you look at the date as Taharok said?

And for future reference, threats are useless against me and make me even less likely to do what you ask. Did I ever ask you to advertise on your free site for me? Do you think I actually care whether you take it down or not?

Think about it.

fine

Oh and Let me remind you!!

You are The rudest person I have ever Known

Oh Your SERVER+Client SUCKS!!!

SILAB MUCH BETTER

DONT CARE ANYMORE YOU HAVE LOST ME AND THE 70 people I TOLD AT SCHOOL!!!

I THOUGHT THIS WAS A GREAT SITE AND YOU RUINED IT
[/quote]

I thought this was so funny I had to share it with everyone. You can even look at his new signature:

MOPARSCAPE IS SHIT!!!The creator is a pedofile!!
Got my own forums Http://teenzone.smfforfree.com
My forums much better NO PEDOS THERE

I might ban him later, his sig is pretty offensive.

So how funny is this?[/quote]
Oh moparscapers, however are you so funny.

Read full topic
item.source: Want a laugh? angry forum member

i kinda agree with the angry dude, most people on these forums are pedophiles

Read full topic

item.source: Want a laugh? angry forum member

item.title: Want a laugh? angry forum member
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

landonsnow1:

i kinda agree with the angry dude, most people on these forums are pedophiles, i doubt the creator is, although he has porn as a cover up when people try to encode the client to thier servers. I still like moparscape though and would much rather this over silabsoft.

What are you talking about?
1)
Most people on this forum are under the age of 18. Pedophilia “is defined as a psychological disorder in which an adult experiences a sexual preference for prepubescent children.”
2)
[see bold]
You’re missing a verb between rather and this.
3)

I am not a mod wanna be. all i want is to restore moparscape to its former life.
I've been around since a few months before the split. Trust me, "moparscape"'s former life sucked.

Read full topic
item.source: Want a laugh? angry forum member

item.title: Want a laugh? angry forum member
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

Ok Ok!!!

There have been Members that have been posting porn!!! onto the forums!!

This is highly Againsed the rules!! and you will be permantly URL banned (Cant access My site ever again)

[b]If need Be I will Set a new Preference!

All new accounts Will have to Be Activated By a admin or ME!!! then you will have to activate Your account With e-mail address!![/b]

NOTE- This Preference is not set yet but if we continue to get members like this I will have to take action!!

P.s. Thank you to my staff for quickly deleting those pictures!!

Most greatful

Oh My God…

URL BANNED ROFL

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Davidude, post:42, topic:258911”][quote=http://teenzone.smfforfree.com/index.php/topic,49.0.html]
Ok Ok!!!

There have been Members that have been posting porn!!! onto the forums!!

This is highly Againsed the rules!! and you will be permantly URL banned (Cant access My site ever again)

If need Be I will Set a new Preference!

All new accounts Will have to Be Activated By a admin or ME!!! then you will have to activate Your account With e-mail address!!

NOTE- This Preference is not set yet but if we continue to get members like this I will have to take action!!

P.s. Thank you to my staff for quickly deleting those pictures!!

Most greatful[/quote]

Ahahah very funny.[/quote]

Wow, I’ve never meant someone who is (or claims to be) that old to have that bad of typing/grammar skills.

Thug-life:

I find it interesting he told you to kill yourself, then have sex, then kiss his ass. His spelling and grammatical mistakes make the message almost unreadable; I think my IQ dropped…

Read full topic
